price: Bagarariji! Mu vy’ukuri, mwebwe hamwe n’ibigirwamana vy’ubwoko bwose[16] mwasenga mu gishingo c’Imana Allah, ni ibicanirizo vy’umuriro wa Jahannamu, mwebwe mwese rero mutegerezwa kuwinjira;
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ
footnotes: [16] Ibigirwamana vy'ubwoko bwose, ni ico cose gisengwa mu gishingo c’Imana Allah. Abasenga abamalayika canke Intumwa nka Uzayru na Isa mwene Mariyamu, abo bazohanwa bonyene gusa kuko basengwa batabinezererewe.

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
